page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: {Impressions of Bishops Nympton School. I have been going to Bishops Nympton School for nearly a year now,on Thursday mornings.Along with seven others from different schools,I am taught by Mrs Wraighte.We do projects on every day things like Transport and Weather. I find their slang weird and their games odd,one of their games is called forward and back one team kicks away from the goal,while the other team tries to score.Ithink that the Bishops Nympton kids are lucky because they have stilts & the geodomes.In fine weather,play is on the field where there are some tyres and a football pitch. When I first went to the school I thought I was going to be teased. I was by my old class but not by my new class.{By Giles WESTAWAY.
